snippet.title: Star Blazer longplay and disk drive sound (Apple II - Broderbund)
snippet.description:
Star Blazer (https://www.mobygames.com/game/star-blazer) was an action game created by Tony Suzuki of Star Craft in Japan and published by Broderbund in 1981 for the Apple ][. The game uses the same quarter track copy protection as Choplifter, with data written to both full track and half track from track 0C to track 1E. You can hear the unique disk drive sound in the boot sequence.

PS: The # of bombs is stored at address $BA. To get infinite everything, change $F6B from 01 to 00.

Credits:
Cover art - www.mobygames.com
Disk image - 4AM
